ilex.fitting.fit_RMsynth

fit_RMsynth(I, Q, U, Ierr, Qerr, Uerr, f, clean_cutoff=0.1, **kwargs)[source]
Info:

Use RM synthesis to calculate RM, pa0 and f0, f0 is the weighted midband frequency and pa0 the pa at f0.

Parameters:

  • I (ndarray) – stokes I spectra

  • Q (ndarray) – stokes Q spectra

  • U (ndarray) – stokes U spectra

  • Ierr (ndarray) – stokes I rms spectra

  • Qerr (ndarray) – stokes Q rms spectra

  • Uerr (ndarray) – stokes U rms spectra

  • f (ndarray) – frequencies [MHz]

  • clean_cutoff (float) – cutoff arg for run_rmclean()

  • **kwargs – keyword arguments for RM tools run_synthesis

Returns:

rotation measure rm_err (float): error in rotation measure f0 (float): reference frequency at weighted mid-band pa0 (float): position angle at f0

Return type:

rm (float)
